title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Classic Beef Burger
summary: Juicy beef patty with fresh vegetables and special sauce in a toasted bun.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Soft and chewy cookies loaded with chocolate chips.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Colorful vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce with tofu.
